body.p: It is possible to continue the numbering of an ordered list even when the content is split in multiple ol elements.

section.title: Using the 'start-x' outputclass
section.p:
One solution consists in adding the outputclass="start-x" attribute (where X is the number you want the list to start with) to the ol element. This is especially useful when lists do not have the same parent:Table with nested order lists

section.title: Using the 'continue' outputclass and CSS
section.p:
Another solution is to add the outputclass="continue" attribute to the list where numbering should continue:
